lines.name: Anathema

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% chance to gain a Power Charge when you Cast a Curse Spell
Your Curse Limit is equal to your maximum Power Charges

lines.flavourText:
Enraged by the incompetence of mortals
The demon-lord opens a gateway
Unleashing a litany of pain upon the world.

lines.name: The Magnate

explicitModifiers.text: 10% chance to deal Double Damage while you have at least 200 Strength
5% chance to deal Triple Damage while you have at least 400 Strength

lines.flavourText:
Few men cast a longer shadow
 than the Great Meginord of the North.

lines.name: Dyadian Dawn

explicitModifiers.text: 1% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life against Chilled Enemies
Ignites you inflict with Attacks deal Damage 35% faster

lines.flavourText:
With her cold resolve
And burning sacrifice
The Eternal twins arose.

lines.name: Voll's Devotion

explicitModifiers.text: Gain an Endurance Charge when you lose a Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
"We are the soldiers of Faith, armoured in devotion.
Let the sinners come, for we - the Pure - shall endure!"
- Voll of Thebrus, at the Battle of the Bridge

lines.name: The Eternal Struggle

implicitModifiers.text: While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, 27% increased Energy Shield Recharge Rate
While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, 17% increased Skill Effect Duration
While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, 27% increased Evasion Rating
While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, 13% increased Life Regeneration rate
While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, 25% increased Duration of Ailments on Enemies
While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, 30% increased Effect of Non-Damaging Ailments
While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, 8% Chance to Block Spell Damage
While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, 17% increased maximum Energy Shield
While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, 29% increased Attack Damage
17% increased Duration of Ailments on Enemies
While a Pinnacle Atlas Boss is in your Presence, +13% chance to Suppress Spell Damage
While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, 27% increased Armour
(24-26)% increased Critical Strike Chance for Attacks
+(5-11)% to Physical Damage over Time Multiplier
While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, +24% to Physical Damage over Time Multiplier
While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, 36% increased Critical Strike Chance for Attacks
+(6-16)% to Chaos Damage over Time Multiplier
While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, +24% to Fire Damage over Time Multiplier
While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, (27-29)% increased Fire Damage
+7% to Fire Damage over Time Multiplier
9% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills
32% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells
While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, 44% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells
While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, 10% increased Movement Speed
While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, 25% increased Cold Damage
While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, 27% increased Lightning Damage
While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, +24% to Chaos Damage over Time Multiplier
+(6-14)% to Cold Damage over Time Multiplier
While a Pinnacle Atlas Boss is in your Presence, +31% to Fire Damage over Time Multiplier

explicitModifiers.text: Critical Strikes inflict Malignant Madness if The Eater of Worlds is dominant
Kill Enemies that have 15% or lower Life on Hit if The Searing Exarch is dominant

lines.flavourText: Simply the way it must be, so that existence may be.

lines.name: Astramentis

explicitModifiers.text: -4 Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits

lines.flavourText:
Mindless rage will shake the world,
Cunning lies will bend it.
Reckless haste will break the world,
And into darkness send it.

lines.name: Ming's Heart

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (41-60)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText:
Ming slew Tranquillity
Took Chaos for his wife
And on Her immortal finger
He placed his Heart

lines.name: Profane Proxy

explicitModifiers.text: +3 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
Left Ring Slot: Your Chilling Skitterbot's Aura applies Socketed Hex Curse instead
Right Ring Slot: Your Shocking Skitterbot's Aura applies Socketed Hex Curse instead

lines.flavourText: The machines do not hate. They merely serve one who does.

lines.name: Doryani's Invitation

explicitModifiers.text: 0.6% of Lightning Damage Leeched as Life
(20-30)% chance to Shock during any Flask Effect

lines.flavourText:
"You can invite them but you can never be 
sure who will come knocking."
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: Call of the Brotherhood

explicitModifiers.text: 40% of Lightning Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Your spells have 100% chance to Shock against Frozen Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Forged by three brothers
so that they may recognize each other
across any distance of time or travel.

lines.name: The Jinxed Juju

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills
10% of Damage from Hits is taken from your Spectres' Life before you

lines.name: Shavronne's Revelation

explicitModifiers.text: Right ring slot: You cannot Regenerate Mana
Right ring slot: Regenerate 6% of Energy Shield per second
Right ring slot: +250 to maximum Mana
Left ring slot: You cannot Recharge or Regenerate Energy Shield
Left ring slot: Regenerate 40 Mana per Second
Left ring slot: +250 to maximum Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
"Shavronne held Sanity in her right
hand and Revelation in her left.
Brutus chose the left hand."
- Kadavrus, Surgeon to the Umbra

lines.name: Snakepit

explicitModifiers.text: Left ring slot: Projectiles from Spells cannot Chain
Left ring slot: Projectiles from Spells Fork
Right ring slot: Projectiles from Spells Chain +1 times
Right ring slot: Projectiles from Spells cannot Fork

lines.flavourText:
They wrap around you
until your blood turns as cold as theirs.

lines.name: Replica Karui Ward
lines.flavourText:
"In testing, Prototype #9 had no effect on fired arrows. However,
an unknown spell did destroy the entire firing chamber."

lines.name: Replica Doedre's Damning

explicitModifiers.text: You can apply one fewer Curse

lines.flavourText:
"Prototype #8 makes it difficult to think negatively, but two fatalities
resulted when a lead researcher used an epithet in its presence."

lines.name: Rotblood Promise

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Blasphemy
Curse Auras from Socketed Skills also affect you
Socketed Curse Gems have 80% increased Reservation Efficiency
20% reduced Effect of Curses on you
(15-25)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Cursed Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Accept the infection, let it take hold.
Then carry it far and wide.

lines.name: Replica Dragonfang's Flight

explicitModifiers.text: +3 to Level of all Purity of Lightning Gems
+3 to Level of all Cyclone Gems
+3 to Level of all Snipe Gems
+3 to Level of all Shattering Steel Gems
+3 to Level of all Lacerate Gems
+3 to Level of all Pride Gems
+3 to Level of all Determination Gems
+3 to Level of all Storm Brand Gems
+3 to Level of all Static Strike Gems
+3 to Level of all Blood and Sand Gems
+3 to Level of all Poacher's Mark Gems
+3 to Level of all Sniper's Mark Gems
+3 to Level of all Withering Step Gems
+3 to Level of all Hatred Gems
+3 to Level of all Ensnaring Arrow Gems
+3 to Level of all Blazing Salvo Gems
+3 to Level of all Burning Arrow Gems
+3 to Level of all Herald of Thunder Gems
+3 to Level of all Energy Blade Gems
+3 to Level of all Lightning Warp Gems
+3 to Level of all Power Siphon Gems
+3 to Level of all Flammability Gems
+3 to Level of all Lightning Trap Gems
+3 to Level of all Berserk Gems
+3 to Level of all Dread Banner Gems
+3 to Level of all Vortex Gems
+3 to Level of all Temporal Chains Gems
+3 to Level of all Anger Gems
+3 to Level of all Purity of Fire Gems
+3 to Level of all Temporal Rift Gems
+3 to Level of all Vengeance Gems
+3 to Level of all Reave Gems
+3 to Level of all Scourge Arrow Gems
+3 to Level of all Blade Trap Gems
+3 to Level of all Pestilent Strike Gems
+3 to Level of all Divine Ire Gems
+3 to Level of all Intuitive Link Gems
+3 to Level of all Destructive Link Gems
+3 to Level of all Venom Gyre Gems
+3 to Level of all Defiance Banner Gems
+3 to Level of all Siege Ballista Gems
+3 to Level of all Assassin's Mark Gems
+3 to Level of all Zealotry Gems
+3 to Level of all Frost Blades Gems
+3 to Level of all Bodyswap Gems
+3 to Level of all Glacial Hammer Gems
+3 to Level of all Summon Raging Spirit Gems
+3 to Level of all Summon Skeletons Gems
+3 to Level of all Animate Guardian Gems
+3 to Level of all Storm Call Gems
+3 to Level of all Holy Flame Totem Gems
+3 to Level of all Blight Gems
+3 to Level of all Blade Blast Gems
+3 to Level of all Precision Gems
+3 to Level of all Discharge Gems
+3 to Level of all Flame Wall Gems
+3 to Level of all Ice Nova Gems
+3 to Level of all Rejuvenation Totem Gems
+3 to Level of all Vulnerability Gems
+3 to Level of all Summon Chaos Golem Gems
+3 to Level of all Battlemage's Cry Gems
+3 to Level of all Wrath Gems
+3 to Level of all Pyroclast Mine Gems
+3 to Level of all Animate Weapon Gems
+3 to Level of all Dark Pact Gems
+3 to Level of all Fireball Gems
Items and Gems have (5-10)% reduced Attribute Requirements

lines.flavourText:
"Did we make this? Why do we have no record of it?
We were warned that there would be consequences..."
- Administrator Qotra

lines.name: Bisco's Leash

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Rarity of Items found per 15 Rampage Kills

lines.flavourText:
You were always there, by my side,
whether we sat or played.
Our friendship was a joyful ride,
I wish you could have stayed.

lines.name: Berek's Respite

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (20-25) to (30-50) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
When you Kill a Shocked Enemy, inflict an equivalent Shock on each nearby Enemy
When you Kill an Ignited Enemy, inflict an equivalent Ignite on each nearby Enemy

lines.flavourText:
"With Flame licking at his heels
Berek berated the clouds
Until vengeful Storm spewed forth his rains
And Berek held on tight
As Fire screamed and steamed
And fled."
- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: Redblade Band

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Golem Skills have 25% chance to Taunt on Hit
Socketed Golem Skills have Minions Regenerate 5% of Life per second
+3 to Level of Socketed Golem Gems

lines.flavourText:
To ascend to leadership, the child of a Redblade warlord
must pull the band from the still-hot
ashes of their father.

lines.name: Perseverance

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Attack Damage per 200 of the lowest of Armour and Evasion Rating

lines.flavourText:
"Some blows must be evaded. Some blows must be endured.
The trick is to tell them apart."
- Daresso, the Sword King

lines.name: Auxium

explicitModifiers.text: Chill Effect and Freeze Duration on you are based on 100% of Energy Shield
(20-25)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills per Power Charge
0.2% of Attack Damage Leeched as Mana per Power Charge

lines.flavourText: As long as the soul is unfettered, so is the body.

lines.name: Ungil's Harmony

explicitModifiers.text: Your Critical Strikes do not deal extra Damage

lines.flavourText: Gentle anger, raging calm.

lines.name: Survivor's Guilt
lines.flavourText:
The burden falls heaviest not on those that died,
but on those that did not.

lines.name: The Pariah

explicitModifiers.text: +100 to Maximum Life per Red Socket
+100 to Maximum Mana per Green Socket
+100 to Maximum Energy Shield per Blue Socket
15% increased Item Quantity per White Socket

lines.flavourText:
A man who changes his loyalties often,
soon finds he has none.

lines.name: Bisco's Collar

explicitModifiers.text: (100-149)% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Slain Magic Enemies
(35-50)% increased Quantity of Items Dropped by Slain Normal Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Friendship worth its weight in gold,
a treasure every day.
I thought together we'd grow old,
until fate pulled you away.

lines.name: Andvarius
lines.flavourText: Danger is the price of wealth.

lines.name: Brinerot Mark

explicitModifiers.text: 25% increased Effect of Buffs granted by Socketed Golem Skills
Socketed Golem Skills gain 20% of Maximum Life as Extra Maximum Energy Shield
+3 to Level of Socketed Golem Gems

lines.flavourText:
Each time, it is granted to the most senior captain of the fleet,
and each time, the ring soon washes ashore once more, 
still wrapped around a severed finger.

lines.name: Eye of Innocence

explicitModifiers.text: Take 100 Fire Damage when you Ignite an Enemy
2% of Fire Damage Leeched as Life while Ignited

lines.flavourText:
"...and so He said: 'Let only the good meet my gaze'
and no eye met His. So He called down the cleansing flames
and let black smoke sweep the Sinners away."
- Book of Innocence

lines.name: Immortal Flesh

explicitModifiers.text: -(50-40) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits
40% increased Armour while not Ignited, Frozen or Shocked

lines.flavourText:
"She begged the Earth to spare her Son;
Out of love the Earth agreed.
To the other Elements she did not speak
And out of spite They plotted."
- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: Soulthirst

explicitModifiers.text: Gain Soul Eater during any Flask Effect
Lose all Eaten Souls when you use a Flask

lines.flavourText:
"They say a draught of fine spirits will ward off
the elements and promote a longer, merrier life.
I have found this to be true on all counts." 
- Zerphi of the Vaal

lines.name: Gloomfang

explicitModifiers.text: 0.5% of Chaos Damage Leeched as Life
Lose (10-15) Life per Enemy Hit with Spells
Lose (20-25) Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks
Projectiles that have Chained gain (20-34)% of Non-Chaos Damage as extra Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText: Darkness never stops feeding.

lines.name: Emberwake

explicitModifiers.text: You can inflict an additional Ignite on an Enemy

lines.flavourText: Leave the world in flames behind you.

lines.name: Soul Tether

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (4-6)% of Maximum Life as Extra Maximum Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
Vaal bloodpriests were among the earliest intellectuals on record. 
It was they who found that a newly freed soul would 
desperately cling to any other source of life.

lines.name: Rigwald's Crest

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 10 Summon Spectral Wolf on Kill

lines.flavourText:
Within the heart of every man and woman
lies the soul of a ferocious beast.
If you cannot tame it, embrace it.

lines.name: Stormfire

explicitModifiers.text: (8-12)% increased Burning Damage for each time you have Shocked a Non-Shocked Enemy Recently, up to a maximum of 120%
Adds (1-3) to (62-70) Lightning Damage to Hits against Ignited Enemies

lines.flavourText:
When your skin sloughs, and your blood cooks,
you'll wish the lightning strike had killed you.

lines.name: Carnage Heart

explicitModifiers.text: (1.23-2)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
50% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech

lines.flavourText:
Forged from the blood of countless wars, 
its thirst has only begun.

lines.name: Pyre

explicitModifiers.text: 40% of Cold Damage Converted to Fire Damage
Ignited Enemies Killed by your Hits are destroyed

lines.flavourText: Let winter come. It will only make my fire burn brighter.

lines.name: Ventor's Gamble
lines.flavourText:
In a blaze of glory,
An anomaly defying all odds
The "unkillable" beast met the divine
And Ventor met his latest trophy.

lines.name: Marylene's Fallacy
lines.flavourText:
"Marylene stroked the medallion at her breast 
before every duel and every cast of the die." 
- Victario, the People's Poet

lines.name: Rashkaldor's Patience

explicitModifiers.text: 20% reduced Duration of Elemental Ailments on Enemies
Items and Gems have 10% increased Attribute Requirements

lines.flavourText: Fate's smile, man's ruin.

lines.name: Hinekora's Sight
lines.flavourText: Remember the past, anticipate the future.

lines.name: Kikazaru

explicitModifiers.text: 60% reduced Effect of Curses on you
Regenerate 3 Life per second per Level

lines.flavourText: Hear no evil.

lines.name: Willowgift

explicitModifiers.text: You do not inherently take less Damage for having Fortification
+4% chance to Suppress Spell Damage per Fortification
(15-25)% increased Attack and Cast Speed while at maximum Fortification

lines.flavourText: The storm cannot break that which bends.

lines.name: The Ephemeral Bond

explicitModifiers.text: +(30-40)% to Critical Strike Multiplier if you've gained a Power Charge Recently
(1-2) to (36-40) Lightning Damage per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
For how little time they had together,
their love was all the more powerful.

lines.name: Kaom's Binding

explicitModifiers.text: Take no Burning Damage if you've stopped taking Burning Damage Recently
Nearby Enemies Convert 25% of their Physical Damage to Fire

lines.flavourText:
For centuries, he burned in an unending
nightmare of lava and flame... but he endured.

lines.name: Dream Fragments
lines.flavourText:
Doryani stumbled into a realm of madness
And awoke its Master.

lines.name: The Ascetic

explicitModifiers.text: (80-100)% increased Rarity of Items found with a Normal Item Equipped
(10-15)% increased Quantity of Items found with a Magic Item Equipped

lines.flavourText: Many things come to one who has nothing.

lines.name: Bound Fate

explicitModifiers.text:
Every 5 seconds, gain one of the following for 5 seconds:
Your Hits are always Critical Strikes
Hits against you are always Critical Strikes
Attacks cannot Hit you
Attacks against you always Hit
Your Damage with Hits is Lucky
Damage of Hits against you is Lucky

lines.flavourText:
Knowing what will happen
and knowing when it will happen
are two very different things.

lines.name: Le Heup of All

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Existence is infinite
A weave of the living and dead
Beyond the understanding
Of the many mortal threads

lines.name: Belt of the Deceiver

explicitModifiers.text: You take 30% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes

lines.flavourText:
In battle, virtue matters not. 
Only victory.

lines.name: Berek's Pass

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (20-25) to (30-50) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks

lines.flavourText:
"From Frost's ice-bound pass
Berek taunted and jeered
Until furious Flame scaled the mountain
Berek escaped through the thaw
And Frost's tortured moans."
- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: Karui Ward
lines.flavourText:
"Shoot first, ask no questions."
- Karui wisdom

lines.name: Meginord's Girdle

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 10 to 20 Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Kaom's strength was rivaled only by
the great Meginord of the north.

lines.name: Rigwald's Curse

explicitModifiers.text: +7% to Unarmed Melee Attack Critical Strike Chance
Modifiers to Claw Damage also apply to Unarmed Attack Damage with Melee Skills
Modifiers to Claw Attack Speed also apply to Unarmed Attack Speed with Melee Skills
Modifiers to Claw Critical Strike Chance also apply to Unarmed Critical Strike Chance with Melee Skills

lines.flavourText:
I once thought the First Ones were just
stories made to scare children.
But I've seen what they can do. I've felt it.
And now I must live with that terrible knowledge.

lines.name: Thief's Torment

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (40-60) Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks
Gain 30 Mana per Enemy Hit with Attacks
50% reduced Effect of Curses on you

lines.flavourText:
The ring I stole,
My finger they took,
A shrouded mind,
Cut their curses short,
As I drained their spirit
And stole their soul.
A blessing is often a curse.

lines.name: Umbilicus Immortalis

explicitModifiers.text: Flasks do not apply to you
Flasks you Use apply to your Raised Zombies and Spectres

lines.flavourText:
"The power of rebirth rivals that of immortality."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 3

lines.name: Wurm's Molt

explicitModifiers.text: 2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
(503-987)% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
(500-976)% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech

lines.flavourText:
They say a lifetime of wisdom is carried
in every skin the great beasts shed.

lines.name: Hyrri's Truth

explicitModifiers.text: Precision has 100% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency

lines.flavourText: Strike true, strike hard, and leave no survivors to retaliate.

lines.name: Berek's Grip

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to (50-70) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks
1% of Damage Leeched as Life against Shocked Enemies
1% of Damage Leeched as Energy Shield against Frozen Enemies

lines.flavourText:
"Berek hid from Storm's lightning wrath
In the embrace of oblivious Frost
Repelled by ice, blinded by blizzards
Storm raged in vain
While Berek slept."
- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: Romira's Banquet

explicitModifiers.text: 0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Gain a Power Charge on Non-Critical Strike
Lose all Power Charges on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
The Empress gave Romira two sons
Born of his brother's seed
Romira threw her a banquet
A perfidious meal indeed.

lines.name: The Hungry Loop

explicitModifiers.text:
Consumes Socketed Uncorrupted Support Gems when they reach Maximum Level
Can Consume 4 Uncorrupted Support Gems
Has not Consumed any Gems

lines.flavourText: Be careful where you put your finger.

lines.name: Mother's Embrace

explicitModifiers.text: Your Minions use your Flasks when summoned
Minions have (25-40)% reduced Flask Charges used
Minions have (51-80)% increased Flask Effect Duration

lines.flavourText: Drink, my children, and be strengthened.

lines.name: Siegebreaker

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have 5% chance to Taunt on Hit with Attacks
Your Minions spread Caustic Ground on Death, dealing 20% of their maximum Life as Chaos Damage per second

lines.flavourText: Poison the land and they'll have nothing to defend.

lines.name: Icefang Orbit

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: You are Chilled when you are Poisoned
Non-Chilled Enemies you Poison are Chilled
Poisoned Enemies you Kill with Hits Shatter

lines.flavourText:
Those members of the Brotherhood who employ the venom of 
Trarthan ice snakes must take great care with the volatile substance.

lines.name: Araku Tiki

explicitModifiers.text: +(150-250) to Evasion Rating while on Low Life
Gain Elusive on reaching Low Life
You have Phasing while on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
It is said to make you invisible when the Great
Spirit comes to take you on your final journey.

lines.name: Ascent From Flesh

explicitModifiers.text: You have Phasing if Energy Shield Recharge has started Recently

lines.flavourText:
A single step forward
Snap free from the prison
Reborn into freedom eternal

lines.name: Bated Breath
lines.flavourText: At knifepoint, a moment's hesitation means death.

lines.name: Blackheart

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (10-15) to (20-25) Chaos Damage to Attacks
10% chance to Cause Monsters to Flee

lines.flavourText: Fear is highly infectious.

lines.name: Blightwell

explicitModifiers.text: 50% slower start of Energy Shield Recharge during any Flask Effect
(151-198)% increased Energy Shield Recharge Rate during any Flask Effect

lines.flavourText:
Long ago, the ocean was a puddle where a golden fish dwelt,
who lit the ocean from within and kept the water fresh.
When the sky burned, the fish dived deep,
never to return, and the waters turned sour.

lines.name: Daresso's Salute

explicitModifiers.text: 10% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life
60% increased Melee Damage when on Full Life

lines.flavourText:
"A bit short in the arm, are you? 
Then you'll be short of a head soon enough."
- Daresso the Daring

lines.name: Doedre's Damning

explicitModifiers.text: You can apply an additional Curse

lines.flavourText:
Where her mouth should have been
there was only a whirling, black void.

lines.name: Essence Worm

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems

Socketed Gems have no Reservation
Your Blessing Skills are Disabled

lines.flavourText:
"This thing is not a pet. It is a parasite that feeds on the very will of its host.
Like any part of nightmare, it has found a way to make its price... acceptable."
- Malachai the Soulless

lines.name: Extractor Mentis

explicitModifiers.text: 5% chance to grant Onslaught to nearby Enemies on Kill
5% chance to grant Unholy Might to nearby Enemies on Kill
10% chance to gain Onslaught for 10 seconds on Kill
10% chance to gain Unholy Might for 10 seconds on Kill

lines.flavourText:
When slaughtered flesh falls silent,
the soul may yet scream on.

lines.name: Eye of Chayula
lines.flavourText:
Never blinking, always watching.

<default>{This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Chayula}

lines.name: Faminebind

explicitModifiers.text: Deals 50 Chaos Damage per second to nearby Enemies

lines.flavourText:
After the Great Fire, the land lay barren
and our forefathers grew weak.
Mother Gull took pity on them
and gave them grain and water.

lines.name: Feastbind

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 5 to 10 Physical Damage to Attacks
0.2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
50% increased Flask Charges gained during any Flask Effect
50% increased Mana Regeneration Rate during any Flask Effect

lines.flavourText:
Our forefathers danced and drank and ate their fill
and did not honour the First Ones for their gifts.
So the First Ones filled the sky with fire.

lines.name: Gifts from Above

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 10 Consecrate when you deal a Critical Strike
(40-50)% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Enemies killed with a Critical Strike
50% increased Damage while on Consecrated Ground
+5% Chance to Block Attack Damage while on Consecrated Ground

lines.flavourText: God blesses those who bless themselves.

lines.name: Heartbound Loop

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have 10% increased Area of Effect
350 Physical Damage taken on Minion Death

lines.flavourText:
When the axe finally fell, Seryl shared his pain,
and the last thought that flickered through his
fading mind was her broken, shattered scream.

lines.name: Kaom's Sign
lines.flavourText:
A token from the sea
A sign for Kaom
to lead his Karui to Wraeclast.

lines.name: Lori's Lantern

explicitModifiers.text: (6-8)% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life
+(20-25)% to Chaos Resistance when on Low Life
Damage of Enemies Hitting you is Unlucky while you are on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
By its light, Lori led her young charges to safety 
and bound up their wounds. 
Her sword arm was iron, yet her heart gentle 
and proof against hate.

lines.name: Malachai's Artifice

explicitModifiers.text: +(75-100)% to Fire Resistance when Socketed with a Red Gem
+(75-100)% to Cold Resistance when Socketed with a Green Gem
+(75-100)% to Lightning Resistance when Socketed with a Blue Gem

lines.flavourText:
When the wind blows, 
Know which way to bend
and watch the others break.

lines.name: Maligaro's Restraint

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to (31-50) Lightning Damage to Attacks
Shocks you cause are reflected back to you

lines.flavourText:
"Our genius will pave the way forward.
May all who are worthy be improved!"
- Inquisitor Maligaro

lines.name: Mokou's Embrace

explicitModifiers.text: All Damage Taken from Hits can Ignite you

lines.flavourText: Fire makes the perfect blossom in the endless night.

lines.name: Natural Hierarchy
lines.flavourText:
Just as the rat cowers before the dog
and the dog cowers before Man,
so too should we cower before the First Ones
and pray we never learn of what comes next.

lines.name: Ngamahu's Sign

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (20-25) to (30-35) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
Recover (20-30) Life when you Ignite an Enemy

lines.flavourText:
A gift from Ngamahu,
a sign to the Karui to spread like fire.
Given to Akoya, but inherited by Kaom with the swing of his axe.

lines.name: Night's Hold

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Added Chaos Damage
Socketed Gems are supported by Level 10 Blind
Socketed Gems are supported by Level 10 Cast when Stunned

lines.flavourText:
In the light of Solaris, the shadows cower and hide.
But every night they gather and grow,
and all but the strong and the stupid
seek shelter from their grasp until daybreak.

lines.name: Perandus Blazon

explicitModifiers.text: -2 Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits

lines.flavourText:
A large enough debt turns even a friend
into an enemy, and the Perandus family
had more debtors than anyone.

lines.name: Praxis

explicitModifiers.text: -(8-4) to Total Mana Cost of Skills
8% of Damage taken Recouped as Mana

lines.flavourText:
The Thaumaturgical masters of the Eternal Empire,
as unpredictable and varied as they were,
all understood one thing:
Free thinking leads to free action.

lines.name: Prismweave

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (14-16) to (30-32) Fire Damage to Attacks
Adds (10-12) to (24-28) Cold Damage to Attacks
Adds 1 to (60-68) Lightning Damage to Attacks
30% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills during any Flask Effect

lines.flavourText: Nothing is as vivid as the rage of battle

lines.name: Shaper's Seed

explicitModifiers.text: Nearby Allies gain 4% of Life Regenerated per second
Nearby Allies gain 80% increased Mana Regeneration Rate

lines.flavourText: The first light to grow in the primordial darkness.

lines.name: Sibyl's Lament

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (8-15) to (20-28) Fire Damage to Attacks
Left ring slot: You and your Minions take 80% reduced Reflected Elemental Damage
Right ring slot: You and your Minions take 80% reduced Reflected Physical Damage
(20-30)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText:
The portrait reflected his pain,
a pain that she could never see.

lines.name: Sidhebreath

explicitModifiers.text: Minions convert 50% of Physical Damage to Cold Damage
Minions deal (25-35) to (50-65) additional Cold Damage

lines.flavourText: The breath of life is yours to give.

lines.name: Stone of Lazhwar
lines.flavourText:
You are slow, foolish and ignorant.
I am not.

lines.name: Tasalio's Sign

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (7-10) to (15-20) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds 40 to 60 Cold Damage against Chilled Enemies

lines.flavourText:
A gift from Tasalio, God of Water,
to the chieftain Rakiata.
Kaom took Rakiata's head and hand
so that his warriors' axes might rise and fall like the waves.

lines.name: Tear of Purity

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 10 Purity of Elements Skill

lines.flavourText:
A shimmering symbol of Purity, clear as water,
but I know better than most how quickly
Purity can succumb to Corruption.
How quickly water turns to blood.
- Victario, the People's Poet

lines.name: The Anvil

explicitModifiers.text: +3% to maximum Chance to Block Attack Damage
Reflects 240 to 300 Physical Damage to Attackers on Block

lines.flavourText: Forge your Perseverance on the Anvil of Faith.

lines.name: The Aylardex

explicitModifiers.text: 10% increased Mana Regeneration Rate per Power Charge
1% of Damage is taken from Mana before Life per Power Charge
40% reduced Critical Strike Chance per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
Shackled fires dance about;
Might within from force without.

lines.name: The Ignomon

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (18-24) to (32-40) Fire Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText: The light that reveals is the glare that blinds.

lines.name: The Warden's Brand

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (5-15) to (25-50) Physical Damage to Attacks
15% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge when you Stun an Enemy

lines.flavourText:
"I don't always have a flame handy
when a fresh delinquent walks through our gates."
- Brutus, Warden of Axiom

lines.name: Timeclasp

explicitModifiers.text: (6-12)% of Damage taken Recouped as Mana
(6-12)% of Damage taken Recouped as Life

lines.flavourText:
"To us mere mortals, time is slippery. 
I'm just evening things out." 
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: Valako's Sign

explicitModifiers.text: 40% increased Damage with Hits against Shocked Enemies
1% of Damage Leeched as Life against Shocked Enemies

lines.flavourText:
A gift from Valako,
appointing Kiloava as the Herald of War.
A title Kaom claimed when he ended Kiloava's bloodline.

lines.name: Valyrium

explicitModifiers.text: Stun Threshold is based on Energy Shield instead of Life

lines.flavourText: They will rise and fall in fire and blood.

lines.name: Victario's Acuity

explicitModifiers.text: 10% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill
10% chance to gain a Power Charge on Kill
5% increased Projectile Speed per Frenzy Charge
5% increased Projectile Damage per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
"Grind your words into sharp thoughts.
Grind your thoughts into the sharpest of deeds."
- Victario, the People's Poet

lines.name: Voideye
lines.flavourText: The darker the eye, the more diligent the watched.

lines.name: Warped Timepiece
lines.flavourText:
As you have lived, so you shall die 
forever trying to keep up with me. 
Your blood on these hands of mine
forever makes me the public enemy.

lines.name: Winterheart

explicitModifiers.text: Regenerate 10% of Life per second while Frozen

lines.flavourText:
Those who dwell in the deep freeze
enjoy a special kind of madness.

lines.name: Maligaro's Cruelty

explicitModifiers.text: (25-30)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Killing an Enemy affected by at least 5 Poisons
(12-15)% chance to gain a Power Charge on Killing an Enemy affected by fewer than 5 Poisons
10% increased Damage with Poison per Frenzy Charge
3% increased Poison Duration per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
"He does not love. He does not feel regret or remorse.
He does not think about consequences, only possibilities.
If that does not describe a monster, tell me: what does?"
- Archbishop Geofri

lines.name: Winterweave

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (12-15) to (25-30) Fire Damage to Attacks
Adds (12-15) to (25-30) Cold Damage to Attacks
The Effect of Chill on you is reversed

lines.flavourText: Fury fuels defiance.

lines.name: Gluttony

explicitModifiers.text: You have Culling Strike against Cursed Enemies
Gain (20-28) Life per Cursed Enemy Hit with Attacks
Gain (10-14) Mana per Cursed Enemy Hit with Attacks
Take (102-200) Physical Damage when you use a Movement Skill
You have no Armour or Maximum Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
What started as a desire to feed
became a desire to learn...

lines.name: Mark of Submission

explicitModifiers.text: Curse Enemies with Socketed Hex Curse Gem on Hit

lines.flavourText:
So great was the thaumaturgy of a bloodpriest's mark,
that sacrifices soon welcomed their death.

lines.name: Perquil's Toe

explicitModifiers.text: Lightning Damage of Enemies Hitting you is Lucky
Nearby Allies' Damage with Hits is Lucky

lines.flavourText: He was a lot luckier before he lost this.

lines.name: The Primordial Chain

explicitModifiers.text: +3 to maximum number of Summoned Golems

lines.flavourText:
The leash of the lifegiver
binds in both directions.

lines.name: Venopuncture

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks have 25% chance to cause Bleeding
You are Chilled while you are Bleeding
Non-Chilled Enemies you inflict Bleeding on are Chilled
Bleeding Enemies you Kill with Hits Shatter

lines.flavourText:
There is a way to survive the bite of an ice snake,
but few have the resolve to attempt it.

lines.name: Fury Valve

explicitModifiers.text:
Modifiers to number of Projectiles instead apply
to the number of targets Projectiles Split towards

lines.flavourText: A single act of anger travels countless paths of destruction.

lines.name: Storm Secret

explicitModifiers.text: Herald of Thunder also creates a storm when you Shock an Enemy
Storms Hit Enemies with (30-50)% increased Frequency
Take 250 Lightning Damage when Herald of Thunder Hits an Enemy

lines.flavourText: Lightning lives in an endless circle.

lines.name: Retaliation Charm

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
Blind does not affect your Light Radius
Blind you inflict is Reflected to you
(10-20)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Hit while Blinded

lines.flavourText: An eye for an eye.

lines.name: Pyroshock Clasp

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Duration of Elemental Ailments on Enemies
Enemies Ignited by you have (10-15)% of Physical Damage they deal converted to Fire
Enemies Shocked by you have (10-15)% of Physical Damage they deal converted to Lightning

lines.flavourText: Teach a man to burn, and you'll be warm for the rest of his life.

lines.name: The Highwayman

explicitModifiers.text: Steal Power, Frenzy, and Endurance Charges on Hit
Total Recovery per second from Life Leech is Doubled

lines.flavourText: Somebody does have to get hurt.

lines.name: The Druggery

explicitModifiers.text: Life Flasks gain 1 Charge every 3 seconds
100% of Life Recovery from Flasks is applied to nearby Allies instead of You

lines.flavourText:
"This will help with the pain.
One for you... and one for me."
- Doctor 'Shaky Hands' Opden

lines.name: Doedre's Tongue

explicitModifiers.text: (20-25)% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite
Cursed Enemies cannot inflict Elemental Ailments on You

lines.flavourText:
Maligaro did the cutting... at her request.
In the new void, a malevolent power emerged.

lines.name: Chain of Endurance

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects (100-150) Physical Damage to Melee Attackers
Regenerate 2% of Life per second for each different Ailment affecting you

lines.flavourText:
"A man confronted with sufficient adversity
may ascend to unprecedented heights
and triumph over his coddled rivals."
- Weylan the Ezomyte

lines.name: Bloodsoaked Medallion

explicitModifiers.text:
Every 10 seconds:
Gain 2% of Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks for 5 seconds
Gain 5% of Life per Enemy Killed for 5 seconds

lines.flavourText:
"Atziri ordained that we exploit the weaknesses inherent in our slaves.
With relish, we did exactly as she instructed."
- Guatelitzi, Architect of Flesh

lines.name: Ceinture of Benevolence

explicitModifiers.text: Non-Unique Utility Flasks you Use apply to Linked Targets

lines.flavourText:
"Put your faith in me.
Our god demands it."
- High Templar Maxarius

lines.name: Tainted Pact

explicitModifiers.text: (2.05-2.99)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
(1-1.5)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Taking Chaos Damage over Time heals you instead while Leeching Life

lines.flavourText:
Beidat made false promises to many denizens,
converting only one into a conduit through
which Wraeclast might be consumed.

lines.name: Soulbound

explicitModifiers.text: Link Skills have (10-15)% increased Cast Speed
Link Skills have (10-15)% increased Skill Effect Duration
Linked Targets Cannot Die for 2 seconds after you Die
Lose no Experience when you die because a Linked target died

lines.flavourText:
"Slay my twin and I will inherit her wisdom.
Slay me and her life will be prolonged by my demise.
Our souls are eternally bound by the sacrifices we have made."
- High Priest Atazek

lines.name: Ikiaho's Promise

explicitModifiers.text: Life Flasks used while on Low Life apply Recovery Instantly
Mana Flasks used while on Low Mana apply Recovery Instantly

lines.flavourText: Even the loneliest of souls can aid a friend in times of darkness.

lines.name: Tawhanuku's Timing

explicitModifiers.text: (5-10)% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite

Spells cause you to gain Energy Shield equal to their Upfront
Cost every fifth time you Pay it

lines.flavourText: The soul still beats, even when the heart never did.
